description: A task to determine if an ontology is coherent.      There should be a single answer, which is a boolean.
A task to determine the indirect superclasses of a class.
A task to determine the all transitive superclasses of a class.
A task to determine the subclasses of a class expression.

A task to determine the direct superclasses of a class.      Includes those entailed by other axioms, e.g. equivalence axioms.      Context: a standard pattern in bio-ontologies is to infer the structure     of one ontology from another - e.g. the metabolic process branch in GO     may be entailed by GO equivalence axioms plus the IS_A links in CHEBI.
A task to determine the most specific common ancestors.
A task to determine inapplicable classes by taxon.
A task to infer assertions over property chains and transitvity in aboxes.
